attributes.action: stop bars/pubs/clus etc discriminating against people just because their in the forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When on a night out or even during the day, as I found out to my distress today, it is now harder for Armed Forces personnell to gain entry to some clubs/pubs and bars than it is for under 18's. We therefore request that, in return for our sacrifice to serve this ungrateful country, pubs/clubs and bars are no longer allowed to reject people for being in the forces.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
